title: Developer
description: I started working at Talan Labs as a developer after my graduation in 2018. I had a strong interest in Blockchain technologies getting out of university and I saw an opportunity there. During my time at Talan Labs I haven't just practised Blockchain skills, I also developed my soft skills and had a complete experience as a front-end developer.

detail.title: Blockchain
tasks: During 5 months I helped mentoring a team of 5 engineering students on a Blockchain project we called Share2Gether: a platform for organizing events with a reputation system to avoid no-show problematic.
In parallel I created a lecture on the main concepts of Hyperledger Fabric as well as a practical traning.
I gave lectures on Ethereum and Hyperledger Fabric at my Engineering School to the 4th and 5th year students and supervised practical work on Ethereum (Solidity) development
I worked on the evolution of 2 similar apps: TalanCoin and VCoin, a decentralized coin to allow for more cooperation between co-workers.

detail.title: React
tasks: I worked at CACIB (Crédit Agricole Corporate and Investment Banking) in an agile team to develop from scratch an interface to display market data, and allow users to verify and validate those data.

title: Research Assistant
description: I did my final internship at the headquarters of Volkswagen in Germany in their Research & Development campus, in the Autonomous Driving department.

detail.title: Autonomous Driving
tasks: I developed a C++ module to estimate the intentions of pedestrians, using a machine learning graphical model called a Markov Logic Network.
